sentences.en: a package marked ‘ return to sender ’
sentences.cn: 标有“退回寄件人”字样的包裹

sentences.en: A typical PDA can function as a mobile phone, fax sender, and personal organizer.
sentences.cn: 典型的掌上电脑具有移动电话、传真发送机和个人文件夹的功能。

sentences.en: If undelivered, please return to sender.
sentences.cn: 若无法投递，请退还寄信人。

sentences.en: If undelivered, return to sender, eg on a letter.
sentences.cn: 若无法投递, 请退还寄件人(如信件上的字样).

sentences.en: In case of non - delivery, return to ( the ) sender.
sentences.cn: ( 邮件用语 ) 无法投递时, 退回原处.

sentences.en: Non repudiation consists of the sender's non repudiation and receipt's non repudiation.
sentences.cn: 不可抵赖分为发送方的不可抵赖和接收方的不可抵赖.

sentences.en: On the customs declaration, the sender labeled the freight as agricultural machinery.
sentences.cn: 在报关单上，寄货人将货物列为农用机械。

sentences.en: Photographs For Exhibition Only . To be returned to sender, No Commercial Value.
sentences.cn: 国际摄影展览之照片,展毕退还原作者, 无商业价值.

sentences.en: The arrow at the sender and ends at the receiver.
sentences.cn: 箭头始于发送者,终于接收者.

sentences.en: The message appears to have been altered after the sender signed it.
sentences.cn: 此消息在发送者签名之后被修改了.

sentences.en: The parcel was returned to the sender because the directions were incorrect.
sentences.cn: 包裹因姓名地址有误而退给了寄件人.

sentences.en: The sender of the best letter every week will win a cheque for £20.
sentences.cn: 每周寄来的作品中，最优秀者将赢得20英镑的支票。

sentences.en: The sender of the message requested a receipt to be returned.
sentences.cn: 消息的发件人要求您返回收据.

sentences.en: The sender uses a drum that can produce a high or low tone.
sentences.cn: 传递者用一种可以发出或高或低声调的鼓.

sentences.en: Typical application: Antenna Air Pump , Popcom Maker , Ball Sender.
sentences.cn: 典型应用: 柔巾机、天线, 气泵,爆谷机, 发球器.
无法投递, 退回原处.

words.tran_cn: 发送；[通信] 发射；信件
发送，寄；派遣；使进入；发射
[邮]寄件人；[贸易][通信]发送人；[电讯]发报机

trans.tran_cn: 寄件人，[信]发报机，发射机，发送机，送话器，发送人，（天线）引向器
trans.tran_en: the person who sent a particular letter, package, message etc
